description:
This is a market on whether Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) will maintain a floor price of under 40 ETH on April 27, 2022 (at 12:00 PM ET), according to https://opensea.io/collection/boredapeyachtclub.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there is at least one Bored Ape listed for sale for less than 40 ETH on the official Bored Ape Yacht Club collection page on OpenSea. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date.

Note that the exact price at the check time will be used. If no floor price is available at the check time, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at the initial listing time.

markets.question: Will the floor price of Bored Apes be below 40 ETH on April 27?
